Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton filed a lawsuit against the Biden administration over its decision to end a public health order responsible for deporting millions of illegal aliens — telling The Daily Wire there will be a “completely open border” if this happens.

Roughly 500 migrants affiliated with gangs were apprehended by CBP officers during Biden’s first year in office, Department of Homeland Security data obtained by The Daily Caller shows.
“The Defendants now seek to eliminate their Title 42 border-control measures, which are the only rules holding back a devastating flood of illegal immigration,” the complaint states.
Paxton’s lawsuit is the latest Republican challenge to Biden’s scheduled rollback of Title 42, a Trump-era COVID-19 policy implemented in March 2020 that restricts asylum claims.
The Trump-era policy allows the government to release migrants with asylum claims to Mexico as they await hearings in the U.S. and is being reviewed by the U.S. Supreme Court.
